title: Can I record a call? Where is the recording saved?
answer: [Yes, you can record your calls in AMR format.]() On the call screen, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111061) to record the call. When the recording is done, a message is displayed indicating the save location of the recording. ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111062) Save paths of call recordings: [If your phone has an external microSD card installed, the call recordings are saved to File Manager > SD card > Recordings.]() If your phone does not have an external microSD card installed, the call recordings are saved to File Manager > Internal > Recordings.
